DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Chlamydial infections persist in the rectum of females who have had a sexually transmitted infection of Chlamydia.
DOC.brief_title: Chlamydia Trachomatis Persistence in the Female Gastrointestinal Tract
DOC.criteria: 1119 years old Female Diagnosis of Chlamydia on enrollment visit Invitation to participate control group Age out of range Negative Chlamydia screen (unless qualifies for control group) Unable to provide needed samples
